name: Enemy detected. Engage!
description:
Controls :
The game is designed for 2 Xbox Controllers.

  • LT and RT: Shoot
  • Left Stick: Movement
  • Right Stick: Aim
  • LB / A Button: Use of the portal
  • RB / B Button: Activation of the portal movements (it moves with the right stick)

Grab your controllers and embark on a frantic space battle against a friend!

Enemy detected. Engage! pits two players controling spaceships. Do your best to handle the craft and use all its arsenal to ensure your victory. Fly over the battlefield, load a powerful projectile and eliminate your enemy!

Game Design & Programming: Florian Piette

Art: Yannis Piette

Known bug : sometimes Unity fails to identify witch controllers are pluged in. Try to reconnect it.
